Summary: driving s on Calif 101 in southern Humboldt Cty --saw a tirangular shape of white lites emerging from behind a mtn near the highway--maybe 3 mi away got scared and kept driving
trends: There have been no other sightings in eureka calif
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy partner and I were driving S on US 101(N. California =Humboldt cty) coming homefrom a Halloween party when we both sawthis large "rack" of white lights - not blinking- in a triangular shape. we both saw it at the same time and came toa complete stop in the middle of the hightway--we both went "what the heck?" but I was nervous so we continued on our way...
